The Report Results Grid

The BIQ results grid behaves in many ways like a standard table but also includes some functionality that goes beyond the basics. At its core, the grid displays the results of your report definition. BIQ structures and presents the data exactly as you tell it to, including the order of the columns from left to right and the sort order that you specified. Some of the basic functionality is called out in the screen view:
